EJ353123.input: {'id': 'EJ353123', 'title': 'Social Class Differences in Family-School Relationships: The Importance of Cultural Capital.', 'author': ['Lareau, Annette'], 'description': "Summarizes a qualitative study of family/school relationships in White working class and middle class areas. EJ533315.input: {'id': 'EJ533315', 'title': 'Effects of Parental Involvement on Eighth-Grade Achievement.', 'author': ['Sui-Chu, Esther Ho', 'Willms, J. Douglas'], 'description': "Expands the parameters of "parental involvement" in educational research regarding its effect on academic achievement. EJ551245.input: {'id': 'EJ551245', 'title': 'From First Grade Forward: Early Foundations of High School Dropout.', 'author': ['Alexander, Karl L.', 'Entwisle, Doris R.', 'Horsey, Carrie S.'], 'description': "Presents the results of a study that tracked the educational progress of a group of first graders from 1982 to 1996. EJ455101.input: {'id': 'EJ455101', 'title': 'World Expansion of Mass Education, 1870-1980.', 'author': ['Meyer, John W.', 'And Others'], 'description': 'Discusses the availability of school enrollment data from 120 countries for the period 1870-1980.
